full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BLA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @001B (CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BLA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS 'DI NI, RANG GI 'DOD PA KHYAD PAR KO SHRI BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL SOGS, RANG GI GRVA BA RNAMS KYIS RGYUN DU BSKANGS RIN PO CAN DU CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO'I BLA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS 'DON BU SHIG DGOS ZER BA'I BLO DANG BSTUN PA CHOS KYI THA SHAL SKAL BZANG MING CAN ZHIG GIS BSGRIGS PA LA, MKHAS RNAMS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, YI GE PA NI SHI RANG PI LEG THU BLO BZANG RIG GROL LO, ,SHU BHO, ,DE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
